author: ceki
msg: ContextJNDISelector is now part of log4j proper.
LogManager was slightly refactored. There is now a InitializationUtil class
to carry some of LogManager's burden.
Cosmetic changes to several files to keep Eclipse happy.

author: sdeboy
msg: fixed multi-select introduced in last commit

author: sdeboy
msg: Changed selected row indicator in colorpanel to an icon.

author: sdeboy
msg: * Re-implemented support for 'refine focus on' text field on the log panel
* Added support for multiple-word operands in expression rules (enclose operand in single quotes
* New colorpanel layout with drop down color list and browse button - much smaller layout
* Added mouse support for setting and adding event fields to the refine focus rule.
